name: Stationery Knights
description:
How To Play

The Stationery Kingdoms are at war!

Protect Rubberfort from the attack of the Order of the Lead Knights and their inky allies.

Click on the Eraser Knights in the correct order to wipe out your enemies and break the siege.

Note

The current version of the game has some very annoying bug issues. Since we have to wait for voting to end to upload the newest version, you may check it out here in the meantime :)

Credits

Davide Amici - Puzzle design, rushed pixel art, pseudo-chiptune

Enrico Cicconi - Code wizardry

Stationary Knights was created over the course of one sleepless week as a submission for the Puzzle Jam by 8 Bits to Infinity. The game features 100% original content.
